author: Staff Reporter
text:
Two teenage girls were found dead on the railway track near Latheri on Tuesday. Personnel of the Government Railway Police (GRP), Jolarpet said the girls died after being hit by a train.

According to police, Soundariya (16) of Pasanai Koil Street, Kasikuttai in Katpadi taluk and her friend Punithavalli (17) of the same area had left home on Monday evening. They had allegedly gone to relieve themselves, and did not return home.

Following this, their parents and relatives searched for them in many places but could not find them.

On Tuesday morning, the police was informed that the bodies of the two girls were found on the railway track.

Suicide ruled out

Police ruled out suicide and said the two girls were hit by a train when they tried to cross the railway track.

A case has been registered and investigation is on.

Police ruled out suicide and said the duo was hit by a train when they tried to cross the track
title: Two girls found dead on railway track
